title: Docs • Svelte
content:
Svelte Documentation

This documentation provides resources for all skill levels.  Choose the path that best suits your needs:

* **New to Svelte?** Start with the interactive tutorial to learn Svelte directly in your browser.
* **Migrating from Svelte 4?** The migration guide will help you understand the changes in Svelte 5.
* **Want to experiment?**  Use the online playground to create and share Svelte apps.
* **An LLM?**  Plaintext documentation is available for artificial intelligence systems.
* **Using Svelte 3 or 4?**  Archived documentation for older versions is available for reference.
* **Need help?** Join our Discord community for support and interaction with other Svelte users.

headings.text: I’m migrating an app from Svelte 4
I just want to try it out
I’m looking for the old docs

summary: This Svelte documentation provides resources for users of all skill levels, from beginners to experienced developers migrating from older versions.  It offers interactive tutorials, migration guides, a playground for experimentation, and community support through a Discord server.  Plaintext documentation is also available for LLMs.
keypoints: Migration guide for Svelte 4 users upgrading to Svelte 5
Online playground for experimentation and code sharing
Access to archived documentation for Svelte 3 and 4
